results.name: Eigentriangle, row sums = A000081 starting (1, 2, 4, 9, 20, 48, 115,...).
comment: Row sums = A000081 starting with offset 2: (1, 2, 4, 9, 20, 48, 115,...)
Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Eigentriangle by rows, termwise products of A000081 starting with offset 2: (1, 2, 4, 9, 20, 48,...) and row terms of an A051573 decrescendo triangle: (1; 1,1; 1,1,1; 2,1,1,1; 3,2,1,1,1;...) where A051573 = (1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 8, 16, 41,...).
